title: LF ADC main to join our amateur PLAT team OCE
body: Looking for a ADC  with good communication and mechanics with a decent champ pool to do a tryout for our team, recently started playing in amateur online OCE tournys with decent success already AND Clash. Plat/Plat last season applicants will be considered. Msg me in game or add me on discord for a tryout. MrsMilf or MrsMilf#8580

replies.body: Im keen. Was plat 1 last season. Done evry Clash. Added you on league.
